name: terrain-extender
effect: Held: When the holder changes the Terrain (whether by move or ability), it will last 8 turns instead of 5.
short_effect: Held: Extends the holder’s Terrain effects to 8 turns.

flavor_text.sword_shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder’s move or Ability.
